messages.subject: Re: Those fleeting introductions was, Re: Intro
messages.msgSnippet: ***Ok, thanks. I was just befuddled over whether anyone had seen any of my contributions to the list, and had wanted to erm, nicely, say it without projecting
messages.messageBody:
***Ok, thanks. I was just befuddled over whether anyone had seen any of my
contributions to the list, and had wanted to erm, nicely, say it without
projecting the appearance of a whiner ;-) ***

Yeah, it's tricky when some lists specifically want introductions. Hard to
keep it all straight. This list gets so busy sometimes it's hard to keep up
with the changing flow of discussion and side discussion let alone
introductions. I like introductions! I just don't remember who's who
until I've read their stuff for awhile. Lot's and lots of people probably
*can* remember new members based on their introductions.

But it's not a necessary part of participation on this list. Nice, but not
necessary. Anyway, glad you're here!

Deb Lewis
